title: RJD Tweets Out Old Photos of Polluted Ghats to Slam Modi Govt
subtitle: The official page of the political party Rashtriya Janata Dal on Thursday, 21 March, tweeted four pictures of polluted riverbanks, but those pictures were old.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The RJD's tweet received huge flak with people accusing it of posting old pictures. Users claimed the images shared were taken in 2015.

When The Quint checked the credibility of the images, it was revealed that two of the pictures in the tweet were taken in the year 2015, while one dated back to 2013, and is from Karachi, Pakistan.

According to a post on Shutterstock, one image from Karachi was posted on 28 July 2013.
